title: Guacamole With Fermented Chile Bean Paste Recipe
full_text:
Guacamole With Fermented Chile Bean Paste Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
15 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
8 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
recipe
guacamole
1 to 2
tablespoons
Chinese fermented chile bean paste
6
scallions
, finely sliced
2
teaspoons
hot chile oil
Directions
Combine guacamole with chile-bean paste to taste. Fold in scallions. Transfer to a serving bowl and drizzle with chili oil. Serve immediately with warm tortilla chips.
Guacamole
Avocado
